main.name: Peter Gomez
main.description: Problem solver for fun and profit
main.bio: I'm a senior computer science student at Florida State University. I strive to be a well-rounded developer by independently studying full-stack development, programming languages, and passing this knowledge onto others. I tutor with my university and privately, teaching subjects from object-oriented programming and data structures with C++ to UNIX administration and system configuration.
main.contactmessage: Find my contact info below. Email is the most reliable way to reach me but I check all social media regularly.

resume.skillmessage: I've aquired hands-on experience with server administration, database management, data science, and operating systems.

education.degree: Master of Science in Computer Science
education.description: I plan to deepen and solidify my understanding of computer science as a field of research while developing my practical skills.

education.degree: Bachelor of Science in Computer Science, Minor in Mathematics
education.description: FSU's degree program has equipped me with a deep understanding of C++, the theory of programming languages and basic system administration.

work.title: Computer Science and Math Tutor
work.description: Appointment-based and group tutoring providing guidance and mentorship to other students. Topics include data structures, object-oriented programming, introductions to C++/Java/UNIX, discrete mathematics and college algebra.

projects.title: duedate

projects.title: mbd-processing
projects.category: An exercise in batch processing and visualizing a large data set
